SettingsGeneralStatsLabel__These_items_w: * These items will process once you have internet connectivity and correct settings.
SettingsGeneralBooth_ModeLabel_Photos_ta: Photos taken to create the print will also be used to create an animated GIF.
SettingsGeneralBooth_ModeLabel_Capture_t: Capture the # of photos in your template to create a high resolution GIF.
SettingsGeneralBooth_ModeLabel_Record_a_: Record a 1 second video then slow it down based on the GIF Delay Setting.
SettingsGeneralOptionsLabel_Enable_virtu: Enable virtual keyboard for use with touch screens.
SettingsGeneralOptionsLabel_Enter_a_pin_: Enter a pin that will be required when exiting full screen mode.
SettingsGeneralOptionsLabel_Leave_enable: Leave enabled unless you have issues with your graphics card.
SettingsGeneralDisclaimerLabel_Require_g: Require guest to accept disclaimer or else cancel session and delete photos.
SettingsGeneralDisclaimerLabel_I_hereby_: I hereby grant the {Name of Organization} permission to use my likeness in a photograph, video, or other digital media ('photo') in any and all of its publications, including web-based publications, without payment or other consideration.
SettingsGeneralDisclaimerLabel_I_underst: I understand and agree that all photos will become the property of the {Name of Organization} and will not be returned.
SettingsGeneralDisclaimerLabel_I_hereby_: I hereby irrevocably authorize the {Name of Organization} to edit, alter, copy, exhibit, publish, or distribute these photos for any lawful purpose. In addition, I waive any right to inspect or approve the finished product wherein my likeness appears. Additionally, I waive any right to royalties or other compensation arising or related to the use of the photo.

I hereby hold harmless, release, and forever discharge the {Name of Organization} from all claims, demands, and causes of action which I, my heirs, representatives, executors, administrators, or any other persons acting on my behalf or on behalf of my estate have or may have by reason of this authorization.
SettingsGeneralDisclaimerLabel_I_HAVE_RE: I HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND THE ABOVE PHOTO RELEASE.
SettingsGeneralDirectoriesLabel_Export_t: Export these types of files as they are generated. Useful to send to usb drives and cloud services.
SettingsGeneralTriggersLabel_When_certai: When certain events happen in dslrBooth, open an application to notify it. Useful for integrating with lights and custom applications. The application will also receive an argument with the type of event and other parameters separated by a space:
SettingsGeneralTriggersLabel_Event_Types: Event Types: session_start [mode], countdown start [seconds], countdown [percent complete], capture_start, file_download, processing_start, sharing_screen, session_end, printing
SettingsGeneralTriggersLabel_You_can_als: You can also call a URL and receive the event_type as a GET parameter.
SettingsCameraLabel_Trigger_the_camera_s: Trigger the camera shutter at the end of the countdown.
SettingsCameraLabel_If_disabled_only_Can: If disabled, only Canon/Nikon are used
SettingsCameraLive_viewLabel_Display_a_v: Display a video preview during countdown. Not all DSLR cameras support this.
SettingsCameraLive_viewLabel_Mirrors_liv: Mirrors live view image to guests similar to looking at a mirror.
SettingsCameraLive_viewLabel_Automatical: Automatically adjusts live view exposure when using a flash on lower end Canon camera models that do not have an option to turn off Exposure Simulation.
SettingsCameraLive_viewLabel_Delays_the_: Delays the capture at the end of count down to avoid camera busy errors with some Canon camera models.
SettingsDisplayOptionsLabel_Changes_prim: Changes primary buttons and border colors.
SettingsDisplayOptionsLabel_Changes_font: Changes font color on primary buttons.
SettingsDisplayOptionsLabel_Changes_colo: Changes color of start screen, lock/unlock, and cancel buttons.
SettingsDisplayStart_ScreenLabel_Display: Displayed if liveview is not enabled on start screen.
SettingsDisplayStart_ScreenButton_Allow_: Allow guests to choose templates from favorites
SettingsDisplayStart_ScreenButton_dslrBo: dslrBooth will use built-in default props if you clear all the props you have added.
SettingsDisplayStart_ScreenTriggerLabel_: Space, S, Page Up, Page Down Keys
SettingsDisplayCapture_ScreenLabel_Numbe: Number of seconds to display each photo for right after it's captured
SettingsDisplayCapture_ScreenLabel_Crop_: Crop to size of photo placeholder in the template for print sessions
SettingsDisplayCapture_ScreenLabel_Hide_: Hide cancel button while capturing photos
SettingsDisplayCapture_ScreenLabel_This_: This image shows while camera is auto-focusing after count-down has ended
SettingsDisplaySharing_ScreenLabel_Count: Countdown on final screen before advancing to start screen. Set to 0 to disable.
SettingsDisplaySharing_ScreenLabel_If_en: If enabled, Final Screen Timeout is the only method to advance to start screen
If enabled, text labels will be displayed at the left-hand side of each sharing icon.
SettingsDisplaySharing_ScreenLabel_Allow: Allow guests to view and share original photos by adding thumbnail in bottom left.
SettingsEffectsDigital_PropsLabel_Allow_: Allow guests to add graphics such as hats, moustaches, or custom graphics to their photos.
SettingsEffectsDigital_PropsLabel_Set_to: Set to folder of transparent PNG images for guest to choose from to add to their photos
SettingsEffectsDigital_PropsLabel_If_the: If the Custom Props Folder is empty, the default application props will be used.
SettingsEffectsWatermarkLabel_Add_a_full: Add a full overlay such as a watermark or logo to each individual photo.
SettingsEffectsWatermarkLabel_Set_a_tran: Set a transparent PNG image which will be added on top of your entire photo.
SettingsEffectsPost_ProcessingLabel_Afte: After photo capture, call this application to perform post-processing on each photo.
SettingsEffectsPost_ProcessingLabel_Can_: Can be used with Photoshop, Imagemagick or similar apps.
SettingsGIFGIFLabel_If_booth_mode_is_set: If booth mode is set to Print + GIF, the number of photos is set by the number of photos in the template.
SettingsGIFOverlaysLabel_Drag_and_drop_o: Drag and drop overlay files here
SettingsVideoLabel_Before_recording_s_ma: Before recording video maximum length is 15 seconds
SettingsVideoLabel_After_recording_s_max: After recording maximum length is 15 seconds
SettingsVirtualAttendantLabel_Play_video: Play video (mp4) and audio (mp3) media files during a session.
SettingsVirtualAttendantLabel_For_more_g: For more guest interaction, prompt guests to sign their prints under Template Editor, Add Session Data, Signature.
SettingsVirtualAttendantLabel_Drag_and_d: Drag and drop files from the left.
SettingsSurveyLabel_Ask_guests_to_answer: Ask guests to answer survey questions before viewing their final print
SettingsSurveyLabel_You_can_add_survey_r: You can add survey responses to print under Template > Add Session Data > Survey Answer
SettingsSharingFotoshare_CloudLabel_foto: fotoShare Cloud is the best way to share, showcase and deliver your event photos. Get a customized event page, password protection, an embeddable gallery, detailed analytics and more.
SettingsSharingFotoshare_CloudLabel_Shar: Share photos with my cloud account to enable QR Codes, SMS, and Emails.
SettingsSharingQR_Code_Display_a_QR_Code: Display a QR Code that when scanned links to print.
SettingsSharingEmailLabel_Display_e_mail: Display e-mail icon and allows guests to share their photos by e-mail.
SettingsSharingEmailLabel_Hide_guest_s_e: Hide guest's e-mail address during input.
SettingsSharingEmailLabel_Consider_using: Consider using email address at your domain name.
SettingsSharingSMSLabel_Sign_up_for_an_a: Sign up for an account at:
SettingsSharingSMSLabel_Twilio_Phone_Num: Twilio Phone Number including country code.
SettingsSharingFacebook_PageLabel_Allow_: Allow guest to approve upload of image
SettingsSharingFacebook_PageLabel_Would_: Would you like to allow sending this photo to: [NameOfFacebookPage] on Facebook?
SettingsPrintingPrinter_AligmentLabel_Us: Use to center your print on paper if the print out is not correctly aligned or cropped.
SettingsPrintingPrinter_AligmentLabel_De: Decrease to decrease printer clipping. Increase if you see a white border.
SettingsPrintingLabel_The_main_printer_i: The main printer is used unless a specific template is set to print to the secondary printer in the Template Editor or "Print to Both Printers" is set below.
SettingsPrintingLabel_Allows_on_touch_pr: Allows on touch press to print one or multiple additional copies from sharing screen.
SettingsPrintingLabel_Alternate_printing: Alternate printing to main and secondary printers.
SettingsPrintingLabel_Automatically_sets: Automatically sets printer orientation based on template orientation.
SettingsPrintingLabel_Limit_the_number_o: Limit the number of prints and hide the print button after max number of prints per event or session.
SettingsPrintingLabel_Amount_of_print_co: Amount of print copies a guest can choose after touching the print button.
SettingsPrintingLabel_You_can_also_repri: You can also reprint using a keyboard shortcut of 1 to 9.
SettingsPrintingLabel_Use_vertical_2x6_t: Use vertical 2x6 template in Template Editor and
SettingsPrintingLabel_to_let_guests_prin: to let guests print to the printer connected to dslrBooth.
SettingsTooltip_Cancel_sending_out_of_al: Cancel sending out of all pending items.
SettingsTooltip_This_image_shows_on_the_: This image shows on the start screen before a guest starts a session.
SettingsTooltip_Display_thumbnail_of_pre: Display thumbnail of previous print when clicked allows guest to browse previous prints of the same album.
SettingsTooltip_When_guest_touches_anywh: When guest touches anywhere on the start screen.
SettingsTooltip_When_guest_presses_space: When guest presses space and other capture keys.
SettingsTooltip_When_F13_key_is_pushed_d: When F13 key is pushed down.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Question_on_Sur: Text for Question on Survey screen.
SettingsTooltip_Use_your_domain_name_or_: Use your domain name or NAME@fotoshare.co to avoid email being marked as spam.
SettingsTooltip_Label_for_Start_button_d: Label for Start button displayed at the beginning of the session.
SettingsTooltip_Enter_text_to_display_on: Enter text to display on start screen when using green screen with user chosen background prompting user to choose a new background.
SettingsTooltip_Enter_text_to_display_wh: Enter text to display when the user has to select an effect.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Print_button_on: Text for Print button on Sharing Screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Email_button_on: Text for Email button on Sharing Screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_SMS_button_on_S: Text for SMS button on Sharing Screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Twitter_button_: Text for Twitter button on Sharing Screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Scan_QR_button_: Text for Scan QR button on Sharing Screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Done_button_on_: Text for Done button on Sharing Screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Next_button_on_: Text for Next button on Image Effects screen.
SettingsTooltip_Label_for_Processing_Vid: Label for Processing Video displayed after video downloaded.
SettingsTooltip_Label_for_Downloading_Vi: Label for Downloading Video displayed after video captured.
SettingsTooltip_Label_for_Disclaimer_I_A: Label for Disclaimer I Agree Button.
SettingsTooltip_Label_for_Disclaimer_Can: Label for Disclaimer Cancel Session Button.
SettingsTooltip_Label_to_indicate_the_us: Label to indicate the user to use his/her finger to sign below.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Next_button_on_: Text for Next button on Survey screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Back_button_on_: Text for Back button on Survey screen.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Enter_Email_on_: Text for Enter Email on Send Email modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Send_Email_butt: Text for Send Email button on Send Email modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Enter_Phone_Num: Text for Enter Phone Number on Send SMS modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Send_SMS_button: Text for Send SMS button on Send SMS modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_How_many_copies: Text for How many copies on Print modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Copies_dropdown: Text for Copies dropdown on Print modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Scan_with_your_: Text for Scan with your mobile phone on Scan QR Code modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Connect_to_wifi: Text for Connect to wifi on Scan QR Code modal.
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Finish_button_o: Text for Finish button on Sharing Screen.
DefaultTextAutoFocus: Camera was unable to focus. Please set camera and/or lens to manual focus and try again.
DefaultTextDisclaimerHeader: Do you agree with the terms?
DefaultTextAreaToSign: USE YOUR FINGER TO SIGN BELOW
DefaultFacebookPageApprovalText: Would you like to allow sending this photo to: [NameOfFacebookPage] on Facebook?
DefaultDisclaimerText:
I hereby grant the {Name of Organization} permission to use my likeness in a photograph, video, or other digital media (“photo”) in any and all of its publications, including web-based publications, without payment or other consideration.

I understand and agree that all photos will become the property of the {Name of Organization} and will not be returned.

I hereby irrevocably authorize the {Name of Organization} to edit, alter, copy, exhibit, publish, or distribute these photos for any lawful purpose. In addition, I waive any right to inspect or approve the finished product wherein my likeness appears. Additionally, I waive any right to royalties or other compensation arising or related to the use of the photo.

I hereby hold harmless, release, and forever discharge the {Name of Organization} from all claims, demands, and causes of action which I, my heirs, representatives, executors, administrators, or any other persons acting on my behalf or on behalf of my estate have or may have by reason of this authorization.

I HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND THE ABOVE PHOTO RELEASE.

Record a single or multiple clips
SettingsEffectsBeautyFilterLabel_Apply_s: Apply sharpening to the final generated file before saving it.

SettingsEffectsFilterLabel_Set_to_a_fold: Set to a folder full of .cube LUT files. These can be generated in Photoshop or downloaded from the Internet.

SettingsLabel_Overlays_should_be_the_sam: Overlays should be the same size as the GIF: {width}x{height}/{height}x{width}

SettingsLabel_The_following_overlays_don: The following overlays don't have the required resolution:
DefaultTextDeleteSessionConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this session?
SettingsDisplayTextTextLabel_Are_you_sur: Are you sure you want to delete this session?
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Retake_button_o: Text for Retake button on Sharing Screen

SettingsSharingLabel_Allow_for_guests_to: Allow for guests to retake session
SettingsGeneralAPILabel_You_can_use_the_: You can use the API to communicate and send commands to dslrBooth.
SettingsGeneralAPILabel_For_example_you_: For example you can use it to start a session with by calling this URL from your 3rd party app.
SettingsVideoLabel_Plays_the_video_forwa: Plays the video forward then backward
SettingsVideoLabel_Choose_a_video_to_pre: Choose a video to preview your settings or use the sample video.
SettingsVideoLabel_Recommended_framerate: Recommended camera framerate: 30 fps for normal speed or greater and 60-120 fps for slow motion
SettingsDisplayStart_ScreenLabel_Start_r: Start recording when tablet starts rotating sideways
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_Set_the_nee: Set the needed sensitivity to start a session.
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_No_motion_d: No motion detected, increase sensitivity and test again.
SettingsSharingQR_Code_Link_QR_code_to_l: Link QR code to local computer instead of fotoShare Cloud. Requires guests to be on the same wifi network.
SettingsDisplayStart_ScreenLabel_OrcaVue: Automatically connect, start rotation, and video recording when fob button is pressed.
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_Calibrate_s: Calibrate sensitivity so recording can start automatically when the tablet is moved sideways.
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_Tap_the_rec: Tap the record button then move tablet sideways to configure sensitivity.
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_Movement_se: Movement sensitivity has been successfully configured.
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_Unable_to_d: Unable to detect movement of tablet. Please try again.
SettingsMotionDetectionLabel_Computer_do: Computer does not have a built-in accelerometer.
SettingsAnimatedVideoOverlaysLabel_Selec: Select the overlays you want to enable
SettingsAnimatedVideoOverlaysButton_Purc: Purchase additional overlays from our online store
SettingsDisplayTextTextLabel_Next_button: Next button on Choose an effect
SettingsTooltip_Text_for_Next_button_on_: Text for Next button on Choose an effect screen
SettingsDisplayCapture_ScreenLabel_Displ: Display liveview within the photo placeholders in the template
SettingsGeneralOptionsLabel_Display_when: Display when dslrBooth starts otherwise open last event.
SettingsSurveyLabel_Answers_to_surveys_c: Answers to surveys can be displayed on the print layout.
SettingsDisclaimerLabel_If_guest_does_no: If guest does not agree to the disclaimer, their session will be cancelled and their photos deleted.
SettingsGIF_Label_If_user_starts_a_photo: If user starts a photo session, the number of photos is set by the number of photos in the print layout.
SettingsSharingFacebook_PageLabel_Requir: Require guest approval before posting to facebook.
SettingsLamaBotLabel_LamaBot_GlamBot_cap: LamaBot GlamBot captures movement and delivers stunning high-speed glamour videos with ease.
SettingsDisplayOptionsLabel_Force_Window: Force Windows virtual keyboard to show
SettingsCameraLabel_Configure_the_desire: Configure the desired settings in your GoPro camera.
SettingsGeneralPaymentsLabel_Let_custome: Let customers quickly pay for prints and downloads by scanning a QR code.
SettingsGeneralPaymentsLabel_An_account_: An account with Stripe, our payment processor, is required to accept payments.
SettingsGeneralPaymentsLabel_Product_nam: Product, pricing and currency cannot be changed in test mode.
